subject: Regarding Nerium and Thevetia species plantations on National Highways.-reg.
text: HRay <cq rTHRf gfeta5<ut (Tsw 4Rde7 & TNTANf TAT4, 4RGT TAR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) arqt T 01-5 Qqi 6, 7z7-10, &1q5, # &arl}f 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 TII /Phone 91-11-25074100 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Environment /2023 Policy Circular No_ 7.4.13/ 2023 dated 01st August, 2023 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/02/04/27/2016/001 (Comp. No. 168999)} Sub: Regarding Nerium and Thevetia species plantations on National Highways. Ref: NHAII Policy Guidelines/ Environment/ 2023 Policy Circular No. 7.4.10 dated 6th April, 2023. The NHAI Policy Circular No.7.4.10 dated 06.04.2023 related to the subject under reference is hereby withdrawn with immediate effect: 2_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. 0923 (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.) To: AIl Officers of NHAI HQ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1_ Hindi Division for translation in Hindi. 2 Library for hosting the circular on library site_ 3_ Web Admin for circulation.
